task: Attached is a spatial single-cell ATAC AnnData project. Evaluate quality control metrics and perform filtering (if necessary). Post-QC, compute the percentage of fragments in each category (Nucleosome-free, Mono-nucleosome, Di-nucleosome, Tri-nucleosome) on the remaining high-quality cells. The values in in adata.obsm['fragment_paired'] should be used to compute the percentages. Return a JSON object with fields: total_cells (number representing total fragments), cell_type_distribution (object mapping each fragment category name to its percentage of total fragments). The percentages should sum to ~100%.
